## {.smaller}

:::columns
:::{.column width="57%"}
#### Before the exam begins

1. 🧹 Clear your desk of everything except a pen/pencil, your cheat sheet, and your ID.
2. 🧢 Remove hats, hoods, and sunglasses.
2. 📱 All electronic devices (laptop, phone, airbuds, smart watch) should be remain in your bag for the entire class period. All items should be on the floor not on nearby seats.
3. Spread out as much as possible. We may reseat you to space people out.
4. When you get an exam, do not begin.
:::
:::{.column width="43%"}
#### During the exam

1. ✅ All answers must be marked on the answer sheet.
2. 👀 If a proctor sees your eyes wandering to other students' work, you will be reseated. If it happens again, it is considered academic misconduct.
3. If you need to use the bathroom, bring phone and exam materials to the front of the class.
4. ⌛ When you are done with this exam, please bring your exam, answer sheet, and cheat sheet to a proctor at the front of the class.

:::
:::

[Good luck!]{.bigadage } 🍀
